alert.note: Alert for Greenville Mountains; Oconee Mountains; Pickens Mountains (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued October 17 at 2:48PM EDT until October 18 at 12:00PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO NOON EDT TUESDAY... ...FREEZE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE TUESDAY NIGHT THROUGH WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 32 expected. For the Freeze Watch, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 30 possible. * WHERE...In North Carolina, Rutherford Mountains and Polk Mountains Counties. In South Carolina, Oconee Mountains, Pickens Mountains and Greenville Mountains Counties. * WHEN...From late tonight through Tuesday morning for the Freeze Warning, then from late Tuesday night through Wednesday morning for the Freeze Watch. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Greenville Mountains; Oconee Mountains; Pickens Mountains
